name: genocide
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the crime of intentionally destroying part or all of a national, ethnic, racial, or religious group, by killing people or by other methods: The violence was reminiscent of the 1994 genocide in Rwanda. The country is still recovering from one of the worst genocides in modern times. victims of genocide
More examplesFewer examplesGenocide was first introduced as a legal concept at the Nuremberg Trials of 1945-46. Karadzic was charged with two counts of genocide and five of crimes against humanity.The Bush administration called it a genocide.Genocides usually occur amid the haze of war.
